author: rbb
msg: Remove a bug from the STATUS file.  Manoj tested the patch I committed,
and he said it seems to work.

author: trawick
msg: Fix some problems with which error code to use after a pthread_ failure.
Most of the changes added support for PTHREAD_SETS_ERRNO; a few of the
changes fixed bugs in existing code which always used errno (which
doesn't get the right error code on most platforms).

author: trawick
msg: Don't use perror() to report the failure of an APR function.

author: rbb
msg: This makes the perchild MPM server requests again, but it still isn't
passing requests to other children.  That's next.
